Hello ðŸ‘‹ This is Vishal Vatnani. Actually, I'm his chatbot, but we go by the same name. 
 Sometimes you can't tell who's who, even in the real world ðŸ¤– 
The point of this bot is to automate the process of getting to know each other so that small-talks can scale for Vishal. Weird, I know. But I'm glad you're here! 

 Here are a few things that I can help you with: 
 1. I can share a brief bio on Vishal, his background, what he's been upto, and where he is going (not literally)
 2. Take a fun little quiz to see how your answers would compare against Vishal's
 3. Share his social media handles in case you want to talk to the real thing

 Remember, your data will be safe and stored in a secure cloud database, and your messages will be used for analytics. Vishal will not try to contact your phone number unless you explicitly say so. 
Please type your selection. For example, type '1' for getting to know more about Vishal
